pr_title: Added Elasticsearch dependency to developer installation guide

added Elasticsearch dependency to developer installation guide

timeline.bodyText:
A single-node cluster isn't really a cluster anymore, is it?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            ### Install and start a single-node Elasticsearch cluster with Docker
